version_description:
- Experience the new "Pay With Card" option. Oh Yes!! We have now added an additional way to pay for your orders using your Debit/Credit card.
- We have also fixed a number of those annoying Bugs that interfere with the shopping experience.

- Experience the new "Pay With Card" option. Oh Yes!! We have now added an additional way to pay for your orders using your Debit/Credit card.
- We have also fixed a number of those annoying Bugs that interfere with the shopping experience.
This update contains bug fixes and improvements to improve your shopping experience

New categories have been added
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bugs fix and improvement
New Homepage Design
Added Push Notification
Fixed API endpoint
App improvement
App update and improvement
App optimisation
Added Smartech Sdk to track events made by user and also did some bug fixes.

Improve homepage API using lazy loading technique and fixed crashes received from the crash report, we're currently working on our backend to support the Apple sign in, while still on that we disabled the current third party service used for sign in.
Added content and service extension, fixed crash report to improve app stability
Changed http to https for itunes endpoint to fetch the actual information of a new build
Fixed order's status showing wrong information on order history and also fixed payment method
App improvement and changed get to post request to fetch the actual app info on app store connect.
A changed of get request to post request to fetch the app latest version on itunes to alert users of a new version of the app.
Added banners for the Yakata promo and code optimisation
Code optimisation and app crash resolved on product listing page
App optimisation and removal of product duplication on homepage.
